name: no-title-bar
author: lexicalunit <lexicalunit@lexicalunit.com>
description: Provides support for a hidden Atom title bar.

trafficLightsPadding.description: A padding width, in pixels, to accommodate the window traffic lights.

automaticTrafficLightsPadding.description: Use the width of your left dock as the width for the traffic lights padding.

automaticTrafficLightsPaddingOffset.description: An offset adjustment width, in pixels, when using automatic padding.

enableLiberalWindowDragging.description: Liberally allow window dragging from any "empty" space.
